title: Scientists use machine learning to ID source of Salmonella

title_detail.value: Scientists use machine learning to ID source of Salmonella

summary: A team of scientists has developed a machine-learning approach that could lead to quicker identification of the animal source of certain Salmonella outbreaks.

summary_detail.value: A team of scientists has developed a machine-learning approach that could lead to quicker identification of the animal source of certain Salmonella outbreaks.
